content:
I'm formalizing quantum channels and need to define completely positive (CP) and completely positive trace-preserving (CPTP) linear maps in Lean.
Here is the rudimentary reference definition for the CP map
Reference Definition:
A linear map E : L(H₁) → L(H₂) is:

  • Completely Positive if for all Hilbert spaces H', the map E ⊗ id_{H'} sends PSD operators on H₁ ⊗ H' to PSD operators on H₂ ⊗ H'

  • CPTP if it's CP and preserves the trace
    Is there some formalization of CP and CPTP maps in LEAN?
    thanks!
There is an open PR (#24359) for CP maps.
Jam Kabeer Ali Khan has marked this topic as resolved.
